defaultPressed.description: The pressed state of the toggle when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its pressed state.
defaultPressed.description_zh: 最初呈现切换时切换的按下状态。当您不需要控制其按下状态时使用。

:v-model:pressed.description: The controlled pressed state of the toggle. Must be binded with v-model.
:v-model:pressed.description_zh: 切换开关的受控按下状态。必须与 v-model 绑定。

disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the toggle.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则阻止用户与切换开关交互。

as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。
